organizations.name: Unilever
quotes: After joining Unilever, Polman told the Wall Street Journal he plans to accelerate Unilever’s growth, but not at all costs.
This type of leadership—founded in deep beliefs and values—is what Polman believes will drive the success of companies like P&G, Nestlé and Unilever.
